@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton Finally,“EU Global Internet Digital Platform Hub”, shall provides real-time surveillance and automated alarms that provide reports on the on-going status for online services and networks liability. As well as, flexible and secure adjustments for IT functional requirements set up.

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton The scaling up process shall be validate beforehand, the joining process to other network nodes and DNS, which must be certify the security and their own matching secure network connectivity mechanism.

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton All in all, robust and secure networks shall start from local networks (at the bottom!), later, since robust and functional security is guaranty, it can be scale up.

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton 4./The new upgrade “IPv”, should content a sort of “unlock to lock online system” that through algorithm validates the functional security to join/not join into upper network internet/intranet lines.

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton 3./ Analysis online IT system that constantly goes into a close control system feedback loop, given output results each hour, day, month….etc. Last but not least, the Enforce Mechanism System functionality should act as a simple Controller Unit.

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton 2./Control online process&operations though the “consigned values and functional secure parameters” that has been defined&set up into the “Enforce Mechanism System”,so then, when “network leak” happens at some extend is detected.Control System will report automatically an Alarm.

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton The four key functional IT principles, should have digitalization (at least!); 1./ Monitoring of the online process and operations that goes from top level networks to lower ones.@vestager

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton Follow up by their “own local network communications systems”, where local servers shall be fully protected from input/incoming networks into the local network (at the bottom chain!).@vestager

@EU_Commission @vestager @ThierryBreton Changes or “new IPv(Internet Protocol version) upgrade” shall start from “each single internet and intranet systems” along the EU countries, where respective internet and intranet protocols are set up according with secure IT functional requirements.@vestager
